text: (rock music)

- [Skyy] I always wanted
to do a creamy jungle juice

and this is it. The
creamy Christmas punch!
Okay, check this out. Watch this,
oh but it's got a lot of twists and turns!

Hold on to your drawers
and lets enjoy this ride.
Bottle of white chocolate liqueur.
Then we come behind that with

a bottle of rum white
chocolate cream okay.

That's delicious right there.
You could drink that as is!
Now we hit it Peppermint Schnapps.
Again, you could drink that as is!

But I've watered down a little
bit of half & half okay?
Okay. All these go together and then

you hit it with a twist!
Peppermint ice-cream.

And now a lot of y'all
go "What is he doing?

Why mess it up?" All
these in the same family!

It's ice-cream. It's
creamy. Okay these brothers,

sisters, cousins all coming
together to make love.

Hallelujah! That's kind
of freaky but it was legal

in the olden days, okay?
So I don't offer practice.

I've never done it but I
don't offer practice, okay?
If that's your thing.

Alright guys the glass is
of little mini candy cane.
Whip off my glasses and there you have it:
The creamy Christmas punch.

I know a lot of you are going
"Oh is he gonna double dip?"
Yes I am because it's my punch
and y'all need to mind your own business
you miserable bastards.
Stay tipsy this Christmas, okay?
And fuck judging people.
(provocative mumbling)
